title.en: Zense wa Kentei. Konjou Kuzu Ouji

altTitles.en: Previous Life was Sword Emperor. This Life is Trash Prince.

altTitles.ja-ro: Zensei wa Ken Mikado. Konjou Kuzu Ouji

altTitles.ja: 前世は剣帝。今生クズ王子

altTitles.zh-hk: 前世是劍帝。今生是渣王子

altTitles.pt-br: Na Minha Vida Anterior Eu Era o Imperador da Espada. Nesta vida sou um Príncipe Lixo.

altTitles.en: Sword Emperor Previous Life, Prince Trash This Life.

description.en:
He was called a Sword Emperor who lived for the sword and died by the sword. And his end was a tragedy. 

However, by strange coincidence, he was reincarnated as the third prince in a country. He was enjoying his lazy lifestyle away from swords and heroism. As a consequence, people began referring to him as Prince Trash.

He never cared about his derogatory name until one day, he encounters someone who gets the wheel of fate to move in motion.
description.pt-br: A espada, vivia pela espada e morria pela espada. Depois de dias e meses de batalha, o espadachim escolheu a morte por sua própria vontade, mas renasceu como Fai Hanse Diestburg, o terceiro príncipe do reino de Diestburg. Querendo se distanciar de sua vida passada, onde vivia como possuído pela espada, Fai decidiu levar uma vida perdulária, ganhando o apelido de “Príncipe Lixo”. No entanto, um dia, devido a um trato com a casa real de Afillis, o reino vizinho, Fai é enviado para a guerra, liderando tropas de reforço. No campo de batalha, Fai testemunha uma cena de desespero quando o “Herói”, uma existência com poder rivalizando com dezenas de milhares, varre o campo de batalha. Fai considerou retornar ao reino, mas a morte de um certo cavaleiro conseguiu abalar seu coração, então ele decidiu empunhar a espada mais uma vez – a lenda do príncipe preguiçoso mais forte começa!

altTitles.es: El hombre de un solo golpe

altTitles.ja: ワンパンマン

altTitles.th: วันพันช์แมน

description.en:
After rigorously training for three years, the ordinary Saitama has gained immense strength which allows him to take out anyone and anything with just one punch. He decides to put his new skill to good use by becoming a hero. However, he quickly becomes bored with easily defeating monsters, and wants someone to give him a challenge to bring back the spark of being a hero.  
  
Upon bearing witness to Saitama's amazing power, Genos, a cyborg, is determined to become Saitama's apprentice. During this time, Saitama realizes he is neither getting the recognition that he deserves nor known by the people due to him not being a part of the Hero Association. Wanting to boost his reputation, Saitama decides to have Genos register with him, in exchange for taking him in as a pupil. Together, the two begin working their way up toward becoming true heroes, hoping to find strong enemies and earn respect in the process.  
  



---

**Notes:**  
- Because some groups use the web version of the manga while others use the magazine version, the numbering won't match between different languages.  
- **Because a takedown notice was sent to MangaDex from the owners of this series, fan translations of One Punch Man are currently unavailable to be uploaded. The series can be read in its entirety at [the official Shonen Jump website,](https://www.viz.com/shonenjump/chapters/one-punch-man) with the first and latest three chapters available at any time and the rest accessible with a Shonen Jump membership (which costs about $2 a month and can be accessed via a VPN if you are outside the US).**
description.fa: در جهان اَبَر قهرمان ها قهرمانی بسیار قدرتمند و شکست ناپذیر وجود داره که به (مرد تک مشتی) معروفه چون اون تمامی دشمنان و رقیب هاشو فقط با یک مشت از میدان به در میکنه. بعد از مدتی سایتاما  دیگه از مبارزاتش لذت نمیبره و احساساتی مثل هیجان و ترس رو در خودش فراموش میکنه! و همراه تنها شاگردش که یک سایبورگ هست به انتظار رقیبی خوب ، ماجراهایی رو دنبال میکنن و……
description.ru: Манга повествует о молодом человеке по имени Сайтама. Он — герой, обычный герой. Основная его проблема в том, что он вышибает дух из злодеев одним ударом. А это очень скучно…
description.tr:
Üç yıllık sıkı bir eğitimden sonra, Saitama, tek bir yumrukla herkesi ve her şeyi alt etmesine izin veren muazzam bir güç kazandı. Bir kahraman olarak yeni becerisini iyi bir şekilde kullanmaya karar verir. Bununla birlikte, canavarları kolayca yenmekten çabucak sıkılır ve kahraman olma kıvılcımını geri getirmek için birinin ona meydan okumasını ister.
  Bir cyborg olan Genos, Saitama'nın inanılmaz gücüne tanık olduktan sonra, Saitama'nın çırağı olmaya kararlıdır. Bu süre zarfında Saitama, Kahraman Derneği'nin bir parçası olmadığı için ne hak ettiği takdiri görmediğini ne de insanlar tarafından tanınmadığını fark eder. İtibarını artırmak isteyen Saitama, Genos'u öğrenci olarak alması karşılığında kendisine kaydettirmeye karar verir. İkisi birlikte, güçlü düşmanlar bulmayı ve bu süreçte saygı kazanmayı umarak gerçek kahramanlar olma yolunda ilerlemeye başlar.
description.pt-br: One-Punch Man conta a história de Saitama, um super-herói extremamente poderoso, que se entediou com a ausência dos desafios nas suas lutas contra o mau e procura encontrar um oponente digno para lutar.

altTitles.ja: 佐々木と宮野

description.en: It all started like a typical old-school boys’ love plotline—bad-boy senior meets adorably awkward underclassman, one of them falls in love, and so on and so forth. But although Miyano is a self-proclaimed boys’ love expert, he hasn’t quite realized…he’s in one himself. Which means it’s up to Sasaki to make sure their story has a happily ever after…!

title.en: The Villainess Is Shy in Receiving Affection

altTitles.en: The Villainess Is Shy in Receiving Love
The Villainess Is Shy to Be Loved

altTitles.ja: 悪役なのに愛されすぎています

altTitles.th: สาวน้อยตัวร้ายชักรู้สึกเขินอายที่ได้รับความรัก

description.en:
My wicked mother brought a girl one day, the Duke's lost daughter, Loretta - the heroine of a novel called *The Duke's Four Children*. And I am Melody, the villainess in said novel who was punished alongside my mother for harassing the Duke's precious little girl. I didn’t want to die like that, so I decided to treat her well. I fed Loretta, put her to sleep, and played with her. And then her response was…?

"I hope Melody marries Loretta!"

Through her endless affection, I ended up coming back with her to the Duke's mansion, where she said "I'll stick close to Melody!"

Has there ever been anyone who is such a 'fool for Melody?!' Why am I being loved when I've only been kind to be able to live peacefully…!

---
When Melody discovers she's a villainess in someone else's story, being a slave dealer's daughter only adds to her guilty conscience. After her mother kidnaps Loretta, Duke Baldwin's long-lost child, Melody tries to comfort the scared little girl and forms a sisterly bond with her. So when the duke finds them, he takes both of them home because now they're inseparable! As the rest of House Baldwin becomes enamored with Melody's warm heart, will she ever learn that she deserves to be loved too?

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%95%85%EC%97%AD-%EC%86%8C%EB%85%80%EB%8A%94-%EC%82%AC%EB%9E%91%EB%B0%9B%EA%B8%B0%EA%B0%80-%EB%B6%80%EB%81%84%EB%9F%AC%EC%9B%8C%EC%9A%94/3321), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/61192421)
description.fr:
Ma méchante mère a amené une fille un jour.
C'était la fille cachée du duc, Loretta, l'héroïne des [Quatre enfants du duc].
Je suis Melody, la méchante qui a été punie par ma mère pour l'avoir harcelée.
Je ne veux pas mourir comme ça, alors je dois bien la traiter maintenant.
J'ai nourri Loretta, je l'ai endormie et j'ai joué avec elle.
Et puis sa réponse a été...
"J'espère que Melody épousera Loretta !"
Le déluge d'affection sans fin m'a conduit à la rejoindre auprès du duc et elle a dit : "Je vais rester près de Mlle Melody."
Avez-vous rencontré quelqu'un qui soit un "fou de Melody" plus qu'elle ?
Pourquoi suis-je aimée alors que j'ai seulement été assez gentille pour me faire vivre paisiblement.... !

title.en: Ore dake Fuguu Skill no Isekai Shoukan Hangyakuki ~Saijaku Skill "Kyuushuu" ga Subete o Nomikomu made~

altTitles.ja: 俺だけ不遇スキルの異世界召喚叛逆記～最弱スキル【吸収】が全てを飲み込むまで～

altTitles.en: I'm the Only One with a Failure of a Skill in Another World's Summoning Rebellion: Until the Weakest Skill [Absorption] Swallows Everything

description.en: The student Nakatani Yuto was supposed to be having a regular life, however his whole class was transferred to another world. All the students gained powerful skills and were worshipped as heroes, but for Yuto who got the unfavorable skill [Absorption]...! ?
description.ja: 高校生の中谷夕斗は突然クラスメイトと共に異世界へ「勇者」として召喚されてしまう。クラスメイト達が強力な技能（スキル）を授かるなか、ユウトが授かったのは不遇スキル【吸】であった。 使い物にならないユウトは魔物との戦闘で致命傷を負うが、クラスメイトは彼を見殺しに…。その瞬間、ユウトにはどこからともなく“声”が聞こえて――…!?

altTitles.ja: お兄ちゃんはおしまい!

description.en:
Mahiro Oyama was just a normal erotic-game loving dude...until he woke up one morning as a woman! Turns out his mad-scientist little sister, Mihari, tried out one of her new experiments on him...with a disastrous outcome, as far as Mahiro's concerned! But Mihari is as determined to study him as he is determined to go back to his shut-in, game-playing life, and one thing's for sure...life is going to get a whole lot weirder from here on out!

*5th place of Tsugi Manga Awards, Category Webmanga  
  
- **Retail:** (Direct Retail From the Mangaka)  
![](https://i.imgur.com/0e9KPgq.png) [Official Melon Books](https://www.melonbooks.co.jp/circle/index.php?circle_id=3753)

description.pt-br: Oyama Mahiro, um dia acordou como uma garota graças a sua irmã que colocou uma droga em sua comida, após ter visto eroges a noite toda. Um mangá de comédia sobre um garoto que se transformou em uma mulher.

title.en: BonHyakuSenSai ~ Jinrui no Jumyou wa Takadaka 100-nen desu ga Kikai no Watashi wa 1000-nen Ikirareru node, Anata ga Inaku natte mo kono Basho de Hitori Ikiteikimasu kara Goshinpainaku ~

altTitles.en: The Human Lifespan Lasts No Longer Than 100 years, but I, as a Machine, Can Live Upwards of 1000, so Do Not Worry, I will Continue on Alone Here Even After You are Gone

altTitles.ja: 盆百千栽〜人類の寿命はたかだか100年ですが機械の私は1000年生きられるのであなたが居なくなってもこの場所で一人生きていきますからご心配なく〜

description.en:
Androids and bonsai trees have one thing in common: they'll both outlast a human's lifespan. Kanna, an android, receives lessons from the "Sensei" who runs the bonsai shop, Kifu Garden. As "Sensei" regaled her with the wonders of bonsai, Kanna would watch with eyes full of curiosity...

A long time has passed since then, and Kanna is the only one remaining at Kifu Garden. Though, a new face seems to have come to visit... A truly human tale of the long lives of bonsai and androids comes together in this brand-new drama.

altTitles.zh: 勇者们都想和魔王修炼

altTitles.en: The Brave Men All Want to Practice Asceticism With the Devil King

altTitles.zh-ro: Yongzhemen Dou Xiang He Mowang Xilian
Yǒngzhěmen Dōu Xiǎng Hé Mówáng Xiūliàn

altTitles.zh-hk: 勇者們都想和魔王修煉

description.en: The cold-blooded Demon King who has beaten all his enemies, who has always been second to none, ended up losing all his magical powers to a female hero who hexed him. What is this magical ritual that you do with the opposite sex’s lips? I can’t believe that even I, the formidable Demon King, have been defeated by this mysterious move! But no worries, I can retrain my abilities. It doesn't matter if you’re a succubus, an elf, a beast woman, or a noble hero’s descendant. I’ll use you as my training partner if I can help it. In order to revive the demon race, I’ll show you the Dual Cultivation Method!

altTitles.ja: FPSで初心者ボコってリアルファイトに発展した結果w

altTitles.ja-ro: FPS de Shoshinsha Bokotte Real Fight ni Hattenshita Kekka w

altTitles.vi: Sau Khi Bị Tôi Bón Hành Trong Game, Có Đứa Hẹn Kèo Đánh Tôi!

altTitles.id: Hasil dari Mengalahkan seorang Pemula di FPS yang Berkembang Menjadi Pertarungan di RL haha

altTitles.ro: Luptând Cu Un Începător La Jocurile FPS

altTitles.ja: 地獄の軍団

description.en:
A boy abandoned at birth and raised by rats, with the mysterious power to control them, grows up seeing 
the dark side of the humans that rejected him, and vows to become humanity's greatest enemy.

An ordinary corporate slave, Ding Xueyang, has a secret - he has a special ability! But his special ability has a flaw; if he is seen using it, the special ability will be randomized to a new one.

For over twenty years, in order to keep this secret, Ding Xueyang has been living very cautiously. He didn't have a significant other, didn't make any friends, and didn't even keep a pet.

Until one day, a homeless person came across his secret, and from then on Ding Xueyang has plunged into an abyss of suffering!

altTitles.ja: 一ノ瀬家の大罪

altTitles.pt-br: Os Pecados Capitais da Família Ichinose

description.en: Tsubasa Ichinose is a middle schooler who loses his memory in an accident. He is able to safely reunite with his family, but is soon faced with a new shocking reality... What is going on with this family?! From the creator of Takopi's Original Sin comes a new kind of dramatic story!
description.pt-br: Ichinose Tsubasa é um estudante do ensino médio que perdeu a memória em um acidente. Ele é capaz de se reunir com segurança com sua família, mas logo se depara com uma nova realidade chocante... O que está acontecendo com essa família?!

title.en: I'm an OTAKU but I want to fall in love with a gal

altTitles.ja: オタクくんとギャルが恋をする話

altTitles.ja-ro: Otaku-kun to Gyaru ga Koi wo Suru Hanashi

altTitles.en: The Story of an Otaku and a Gyaru Falling in Love

altTitles.es-la: Una historia sobre un otaku y una gal que se enamoran

altTitles.ja: オタクだってギャルと恋したい

altTitles.ru: Даже отаку хочет влюбиться в гяру

description.en: Affection Level of each Gyarus for a single Otaku. Who will our otaku-kun chose as his girl?
description.es-la: El nivel de afecto de cada Gyarus por un único otaku. ¿A quién elegirá nuestro otaku-kun como su chica?

altTitles.ja: 高手～武術の達人～

description.en:
A young man set forth to avenge his master, a once powerful martial artist who was betrayed by his own men and barely escaped with his life. Armed with his master's supreme martial art techniques, he is ready to bring terror and wreak havoc among the murim. But before he even got started, he learns that the ones who had betrayed his master are already dead… Erm, so what happens now?

description.fr:
Gang Ryong s'est entraîné pendant des années pour venger son maître trahi et laissé pour mort par ses anciens subordonnés. Mais une fois prêt à accomplir sa mission, les choses ne vont pas se dérouler comme prévu pour notre héros…

description.ru:
Юный мастер боевых искусств, следуя завету своего почившего учителя, отправляется вершить возмездие его вероломным предателям. Напичканный до зубов священными боевыми техниками самого Верховного Крушителя, он попутно планирует воссоздать великую армию и начать сеять хаос и разрушения. Вот только оказалось, что предатели давным-давно умерли. Накрылись медным тазом планы мести, а с ними и мечты о геройских похождениях, тут и вебочке конец…

altTitles.ja: 王室教師ハイネ

description.en: Accepting the post of Royal Tutor at the court of the king of Grannzreich, Heine Wittgenstein is a little professor with a big job ahead! Each of the kingdom's four princes has a rather distinct personality. Does their diminutive new instructor have what it takes to lay down some learning? It's a comedy of educational proportions!

altTitles.ja: 嘘ギャル

altTitles.ja-ro: Captain Tsubasa Memories ~Kore wa Nankatsu Shō vs Shūtetsu Shō Taikōsen Tōjitsu ni Okotta Hanashi~

altTitles.ja: キャプテン翼 MEMORIES

altTitles.en: I'm Wakabayashi Genzo, birth of the SGGK
The legend of the strongest Meiwa FC

description.en: A collection of the "Captain Tsubasa Memories" one-shot series.

Eunho, the strongest in the yokai realm!
He gained the chance to become a human being after losing the woman he loved and killing countless yokai.
After passing the gate of reincarnation by accumulating merit for a thousand years to abandon his immortal body…

He became a human being, held a sword, and learned martial arts for the first time.
But this is very… easy?

altTitles.ja: さよならだったらよかった

description.vi:
Hôm nay tôi sẽ lại được ôm hôn bởi em trai của người đàn ông tôi yêu.

Keigo, một cựu tiểu thuyết gia đầy tham vọng, đã yêu đơn phương lâu dài với người bạn thời thơ ấu của mình, Ryuuji. Và vì không thể quên một câu nói đùa Ryuuji đã nói từ bé, cậu thậm chí còn có một sở thích là tự nuông chiều bản thân bằng cách mặc quần bó màu đen.

Người duy nhất biết về hai “bí mật” của cậu là Saku, một sinh viên mỹ thuật muốn trở thành nhiếp ảnh gia —em trai của Ryuuji.

Như để an ủi những cảm xúc không còn nơi nào để trút của Keigo, Saku tự gọi mình là “Ryuuji” và ôm Keigo để làm người thay thế cho anh trai.

Lạc lối khi cố gắng hướng tới ánh sáng, tình yêu của cậu trong ánh bình minh thật dịu dàng và tươi đẹp…

altTitles.ja: 新婚ヤンキーデレる

description.en:
While in hot pursuit of wanted criminals, police officer Do Gyeong Joon has an unexpected encounter with a rather uncanny demon. Barely surviving the accident, he is left baffled, staring at the sky at the retreating form of the mysterious being he had just met. However, not long after, the two meet again when the demon crashes into Gyeong Joon’s apartment, whispering,  
“Hurry up! I need to get inside you-”

altTitles.ja: J⇔M　ジェイエム

description.en:
J is a lone assassin feared as "untouchable" in the underworld.
Megumi is a lonely girl who has no place at home or school.
When the two meet, an unexpected story begins.
description.uk: Джей - самотній найманий вбивця, якого у злочинному світі вважають "невразливим". Меґумі - самотня дівчинка, якій немає місця ні вдома, ні в школі. Коли вони познайомилися, розпочалася несподівана історія, Джей та Меґумі обмінялися тілами. Тепер, Джей змушений взятися за завдання по вбивству у своєму новому тілі.

altTitles.ja: 夜桜さんちの大作戦

altTitles.vi: Nhiệm vụ tối thượng nhà Yozakura

description.en:
Taiyo Asano is a super shy high school student and the only person he can talk to is his childhood friend, Mutsumi Yozakura. It turns out that Mutsumi is the daughter of the ultimate spy family! Even worse, Mutsumi is being harassed by her overprotective, nightmare of a brother, Kyoichiro. What drastic steps will Taiyo have to take to save Mutsumi?! A spy family comedy - the mission begins!

---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media as **Mission: Yozakura Family** (2023)
description.fr:
Afin de protéger Mutsumi et de découvrir la véritable raison de la mort de ses parents, Taiyo Asano va devoir devenir membre de la famille Yozakura, une famille d’espions de haut vol ! Parviendra-t-il à survivre à ce quotidien plein de dangers pour, cette fois, réussir à protéger ceux qui lui sont chers ?

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Kana**
description.it:
:||Tradotto da [Isekai Italy Scan](https://linktr.ee/isitscan/) e [Bullet Club](https://mangadex.org/group/8588/bullet-club)   
  
Taiyo Asano è un timidissimo studente delle superiori e l'unica persona a cui può parlare è la sua amica d'infanzia, Mutsumi Yozakura. Si scopre che Mutsumi è la figlia della suprema famiglia di spie! Ancora peggio, Mustumi viene tormentata dal suo fratello iperprotettivo, Kyoichiro. Quale tragico destino Taiyo dovrà affrontare per salvare Mustumi?! Una commedia su una famiglia di spie - la missione avrà inizio!||
description.pt-br: Taiyo Asano é um estudante super tímido do ensino médio e a única pessoa com quem ele consegue conversar é sua amiga de infância, Mutsumi Yozakura. Acontece que Mutsumi é a filha da melhor família de espiões! Pior ainda, Mutsumi está sendo assediada por seu super-protetor, o pesadelo de um irmão, Kyoichiro. Que passos drásticos Taiyo terá que tomar para salvar Mutsumi? Uma comédia familiar de espiões – a missão começa!

description.en:
A mysterious and unknown game journey.  
In the virtual game, experience the brilliance and darkness of human nature. When the player's game journey reaches the end, what is waiting for them …

The dragon girl met her dragon hunter when her hometown was consumed by flames. The hunter protected her by forming the Partner Alliance-a sacred contract bonding the destined two together-and dragged her out of the sea of fire. Together, they set out seeking revenge. Little did they know that…by taming her, he was also tamed by her.

altTitles.ja: 三咲くんは攻略キャラじゃない

description.en: In this gal game world. The mission of the best friend character, Izumi Misaki, is supposed to be to support the protagonist, Hareta Kihara, in romancing the heroine... but for some reason, the crucial Kihara is planning to capture Misaki's heart instead!? "Become the heroine while remaining a boy!" Friendship? Romance? A heart-pounding comedy about a femboy!
description.ja: ここはギャルゲーの世界。 親友キャラ・三咲泉の使命は、主人公・季原晴太のヒロイン攻略のサポート…のはずが、 肝心の季原は何故か三咲を攻略するつもりで――!? 「男の子のままヒロインになってくれ！」 友情？愛情？男の娘ハッピー胸キュンコメディ!!

altTitles.ja: アズールレーン４コママンガ　びそくぜんしんっ！

description.en: Official 4-koma webcomic from the popular mobile game Azur Lane.

altTitles.lt: AÅ¡ voras, ir kas iÅ¡ to?

altTitles.id: Aku ini laba laba, lalu apa ?

altTitles.sv: Jag är en spindel, vadå då?

altTitles.no: Jeg er en edderkopp, hva så?

altTitles.pl: No i co z tego że jestem pająkiem?

altTitles.ru: Да, я паук, и что же?
Да, я паук, и что с того?

altTitles.fa: من یک عنکبوتم. خب که چی؟

altTitles.th: แมงมุมแล้วไง, ข้องใจเหรอคะ?

altTitles.ja: 蜘蛛ですが、なにか？

altTitles.de: Ich bin eine Spinne, na und?!

altTitles.pt-br: Então eu sou uma aranha, e daí?

altTitles.en: So I'm a Spider, So What?

description.en:
When a mysterious explosion killed an entire class full of high school students, the souls of everyone in class were transported into a fantasy world and reincarnated. While some students were reincarnated as princes or prodigies, others were not as blessed.  
Our heroine, who was the lowest in the class, discovered that she was reincarnated as a spider! Now at the bottom of the food chain, she needs to adapt to the current situation with willpower in order to live. Stuck in a dangerous labyrinth filled with monsters, it's eat or be eaten!  
This is the story of a spider doing whatever she can in order to survive!
description.ru: В результате необъяснимого происшествия с участием пикселей класс обычных японских школьников погибает, но перерождается в другом мире. А нашей героине, которая была самой непопулярной в классе, повезло куда больше. Она переродилась пауком в подземелье, полном опасностей. Сможет ли она, используя лишь свою хитрость и удачу, выжить?
description.pt-br: Quando uma misteriosa explosão mata toda uma classe cheia de alunos do ensino médio, as almas de todos na sala de aula são transportadas para um mundo de fantasia e reencarnados. Enquanto alguns estudantes foram reencarnados como príncipes ou prodígios, outros não foram tão abençoados. Nossa heroína, que era a menor na classe, descobriu que ela estava reencarnado como uma aranha!? Agora, na parte inferior da cadeia alimentar, ela precisa se adaptar à situação atual com a força de vontade para viver! Preso em um labirinto perigoso, repleto de monstros, é comer ou ser comido! Esta é a história de uma aranha fazendo tudo o que puder para sobreviver!

title.en: A Cool Older Lady Who Drives Me Crazy

altTitles.ja: 僕を狂わすカッコイイお姉さん

altTitles.en: A Cool Older Lady That Makes Me Crazy

altTitles.pt-br: Uma mulher mais velha legal que me deixa louco

altTitles.es-la: Una mujer mayor genial que me vuelve loco

altTitles.ja: ひとりぼっちの異世界攻略

altTitles.zh: 孤單一人的異世界攻略

altTitles.zh-ro: Duzi Yi Ren De Yi Shijie Gonglüe

altTitles.zh-hk: 獨自一人的異世界攻略

altTitles.th: นายโดดเดี่ยวพิชิตต่างโลก

altTitles.en: Lonely Attack on the Different World

description.en:
The strongest doesn’t need any cheats! Haruka, who spends his high school life a loner, was suddenly summoned to another world one day along with all his classmates. When ol’ God enters the picture, Haruka believes he can just choose whatever cheat skill he wants to help him survive in the new world… But, contrary to his expectations, that list of cheat skills works on a first come, first serve basis. And so, his classmates pick out all the cheat skills. His choices now limited to leftovers, Haruka finds himself incapable of assembling a party due to his own “loner” skill. Even though it’s a different world, it seems his adventuring days will be, as per usual, a solitary affair… After becoming aware of a crisis looming over his classmates, Haruka makes a silent vow to save them. No relying on cheats! He will walk a heretical path of strength that transcends the need for them.  
  
The curtain rises on the strongest loner’s otherworld strategy guide!
description.es-la: El fuerte no necesita trucos. Haruka, un estudiante de preparatoria quien gastó su vida como un "solitario", es convocado a otro mundo con sus compañeros de clases. Al ser convocado se encuentra con un "Dios", quien le da a escoger una habilidad, sin embargo... No era lo que esperaba encontrarse.
description.pt-br:
Exilado da classe? Checado  
  
Ser transportado para um mundo alternativo com seus colegas? Checado  
  
 Encontrar um Deus em uma espécie de Limbo entre os dois mundos? Checado  
  
 Pegar uma skill roubada? Não gostaria de ser você, já foram todas vendidas.  
  
 Essa história é sobre a aventura de um garoto solitário em um mundo alternativo, não agradecido a um Deus sênil que deu a ele todas as habilidades que não precisava.

title.en: The Lecture You Would Never Want Your Parents To Give You

altTitles.ja: 親に絶対されたくない説教

altTitles.ja-ro: Oya ni Zettai sa Retakunai Sekkyou

altTitles.fr: Le sermon que vous ne voudriez jamais recevoir de vos parents

altTitles.ru: Лекция, которую вы бы не хотели услышать от родителей

altTitles.vi: Bài Thuyết Giáo mà ta Không bao giờ Muốn nghe từ phụ Huynh

title.en: Kimi wa Yakamashi Tojite yo Kuchi o!

altTitles.ja: 君は喧し閉じてよ口を！

altTitles.ja-ro: Kimi ha Yakamashi Tojite yo Kuchi wo!

altTitles.en: You're Too Noisy, So Just Shut It Already!
You Talk Too Much, So Just Shut It Already!

altTitles.vi: Cậu Ồn Ào Quá, Im lặng Giùm Tớ Đi!

altTitles.ru: Ты слишком много говоришь, так что заткнись уже!

altTitles.tl: Ang Ingay Mo Kaya Manahimik Ka Na Lang!

description.en: Hīragi Tsukino was born deaf. When she transfers to a new school, she meets a talkative boy named Enomoto Taiyō. Tsukino is slightly taken aback by Taiyō, who talks to her without regard to the fact that she can't hear.
description.ja: 柊月乃は生まれつき耳が聞こえない。そんな彼女が転校先で出会ったのは、おしゃべりな男子・榎本太陽。聞こえないことなんかお構いなしにしゃべりかけてくる太陽に若干引き気味な月乃。
description.ru: Хиираги Цукино родилась глухой. Когда она переводится в новую школу, она встречает говорливого мальчика по имени Эномото Тайо. Цукино немного обескуражена тем, что Тайо разговаривает с ней, не заботясь о том, что она не может его слышать...
description.vi: Hiiragi Tsukino là một cô bạn bị khiếm thính bẩm sinh. Khi cậu ấy chuyển đến trường mới, cậu ấy gặp được một cậu bạn lắm mồm tên Enomoto Taiyo. Tại đây, Tsukino luôn bị xoay tròn bởi những câu chuyện xàm xí của Taiyo bất chấp việc cô không thể nghe được cậu ta nói gì.

title.en: TenPuru -No One Can Live on Loneliness-

altTitles.es: Templo - Nadie puede vivir en soledad

altTitles.ja: てんぷる

altTitles.de: TenPuru: Von Einsamkeit kann man nicht leben

description.en: That's right, I'll become a monk! Not knowing what to do with his worldly desires, Akagami Akemitsu aims to live a stoic life. However, the thick karmic blood flowing in him will not permit it!
description.es: Así es, me volveré un monje! Al no saber qué hacer con sus deseos mundanos, Akagami Akemitsu aspira a llevar una vida estoica. Sin embargo, la espesa corriente de energía del karma que fluye en él no lo permitirá.
description.es-la: "É isso mesmo, eu vou me tornar um monge!". Sem saber o que fazer com seus desejos mundanos, Akagami Akemitsu decide viver uma vida estóica. No entanto, o sangue cármico espesso que flui nele não permitirá!

altTitles.ja: 出来損ないのラブソング

description.vi:
“Tôi sẽ giúp anh quên anh ta”

Kazari yêu thầm người bạn trong cùng ban nhạc -Kei- đã lâu nhưng Kei lại có bạn gái. Phận yêu đơn phương nên cậu đã gửi gắm tình cảm của mình vào âm nhạc chứ không nói ra. Vô tình vào một buổi diễn Kazari gặp Kotaro, guitarist mới của ban, Kotaro liên tục bắt chuyện và tán tỉnh cậu. Sau “một số chuyện” xảy ra buổi tối hôm chào đón người mới, Kotaro đã thẳng thắn tỏ tình và muốn được hẹn học với Kazari. Với cuộc tấn công liên tiếp từ Kotaro, liệu Kazari có động lòng và quên đi được mối tình đang đơn phương?

altTitles.ja: 終末トレインどこへいく？

altTitles.en: Train to the End of World

altTitles.ja: ヒョウ人 -BLADES OF THE GUARDIANS-

description.en: Escort refers to paid warriors. Their targets of protection are also referred to targets as they are wanted by the government. On the eve of civil chaos during the last years of Sui dynasty, with the rise of a reign of terror around the country, various peoples' feelings of grudge and animosity develop.
description.id: Mengambil latar belakang di akhir Dinasti Sui (581–618), munculnya banyak kekacauan di seluruh negeri. Dao Ma dan anaknya Xiao Qi, mencari uang dengan cara menjadi pengawal bayaran atau membunuh orang yang menjadi incaran pemerintah.

description.en: An unofficial compilation of oneshots / 4-komas by Cacomistle (カコミスル) in their twitter profile.

title.en: My Way Of Killing Gods In Another World

altTitles.en: My Path to Killing Gods in Another World
I Walk On A Road To Slay Enemies In My Way In Other World

altTitles.zh: Wo Zai Yi Jie De Shi Shen Zhi Lu

description.en:
The genius top student played games in an attempt to flirt with girls, but was struck by lightning on a rainy day and transported into the world of the game?! To survive here, he could only rely on himself. Surrounded by monsters and gods, full of dangers, can he still return to his own world and continue chasing girls?!

---
- [Original Manhua <Tencent Comics>](https://ac.qq.com/Comic/comicInfo/id/650653)
- [Original Manhua <Bilibili Comics>](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc29992)
- [Original Manhua <Kuaikan Manhuas>](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/11031/)
description.fr:
Chen Zhi est un étudiant et un talentueux kenshi. En jouant à un jeu à la poursuite d'une fille, il se fait frapper par un éclair et se retrouve enfermé dans le jeu !
Il cherche à survivre, mais ne s'attend pas à rencontrer un boss dès le début !
Le joueur Chen Zhi va-t-il mourir ou saura-t-il vaincre ce boss ?

---
- [Manhua Original <Tencent Comics>](https://ac.qq.com/Comic/comicInfo/id/650653)

title.en: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure Part 1 - Phantom Blood

altTitles.ro: Aventurile Bizare ale lui JoJo Partea 1: Sângele Trecutului

altTitles.it: JoJo e a sua Aventura Bizarra: Phantom Blood

altTitles.ja-ro: JoJo no Kimyou na Bouken: Phantom Blood

altTitles.en: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure Part 1: Jonathan Joestar: His Youth

altTitles.th: Jojoล่าข้ามศตวรรษ

altTitles.es: La Extraña Aventura de JoJo: Sangre Fantasmal

altTitles.fr: Le bizzarre avventure di Jojo: Phantom Blood

altTitles.ar: مغامرة جوجو الغريبة الجزء 1: دماء الشبح

altTitles.ja: ジョジョの奇妙な冒険
ファントムブラッド

altTitles.pt-br: Jojo's Bizarre Adventure - Parte 1: Phantom Blood

description.en:
First story arc of the Jojo's Bizarre Adventure series.  
  
Jonathan Joestar, a young wealthy son living in Victorian England, has his life destroyed by a recently orphaned Dio Brando, who was taken in by Jonathan's father. Dio, who plots to drive Jonathan to insanity and inherit the Joestar fortune, becomes an unstoppable vampire that Jonathan must fight.

[Official English](https://www.viz.com/read/manga/jojo-s-bizarre-adventure-part-1-phantom-blood/all)

When Wen Yifan returned to her hometown for work, she met the rumoured “First-Class Handsome Guy” in a bar, but he turned out to be Sang Yan, whom she hurt and rejected in high school! In a twist of fate, the two people who could never get along kept bumping into each other. They even rented the same unit by chance and became housemates! Unspoken feelings refusing to see the light of day, strong emotions stirring beneath it all… Let’s see how Sang Yan, the “Peak Ideal Boyfriend” interprets and expresses deep affections and sweet love!

altTitles.ja: レンタルタマちゃん

description.vi: Một nhân viên văn phòng yêu mèo quyết định sử dụng dịch vụ cho thuê mèo nhưng không ngờ “thuê mèo” ở đây lại là dịch vụ khác…

title.en: The Duke of Death and His Maid

altTitles.fr: Le duc de la Mort et sa gouvernante obscure

altTitles.ru: Смертоносный герцог и его черная горничная

altTitles.ar: النبيل الشاب حاصد الأرواح و خادمته السوداء

altTitles.ja: 死神坊ちゃんと黒メイド

altTitles.en: The Duke of Death and His Black Maid

description.en:
In a large mansion lives a boy, an aristocrat who was cursed by the witch to "let everything he touches die." With him is his maid Alice, who besides serving him, likes to tease him. The boy who is interested in her doesn't mind the teasing, but not being able to touch her is painful!  
  
If they are unable to hold hands, how will their love ever bloom?
description.tr: Hikâye büyük bir malikanede yaşayan kaderi bir cadı tarafından mühürlenen bir çocuk ve onunla beraber yaşayan hizmetçi Alice hakkında; çocuk dokunduğu her şeyi ölüme sürüklerken; Alice ile hiç el ele tutuşamayacak olmalarına rağmen yaşanan inişli çıkışlı bir aşk.

title.en: The Café Terrace and Its Goddesses

altTitles.ja: 女神のカフェテラス
Megami no Kafeterasu

description.en:
Kasukabe Hayato has been accepted to Tokyo U on his first try. Receiving news of his grandmother's death, he returns to his childhood home, Cafe Terrace Familia, for the first time in three years to find five strange girls there who claim to be "Grandma's Family"! Hayato's unexpected life in a seaside town with these five girls of fate begins here!  
  
In this handsome harem under one roof by Koji Seo of *Suzuka*, *Kimi no Iru Machi*, and *Fuuka*, which girl will you fall in love with? A seaside love comedy with too many heroines!

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10009/episode/319474) (U.S. Only)
description.ru: Спустя три года, после ссоры со своей бабушкой, Хаято Касукабэ возвращается в свой родной дом в котором поселилось пять девушек. Выясняется, что бабушка Хаято позволила девушкам жить в этом доме, а те заботились о ней до самой её смерти. Так начинается история Хаято и пяти "Богинь".

title.en: WataMote: No Matter How I Look at It, It's You Guys' Fault I'm Not Popular!

altTitles.en: It's Not My Fault That I'm Not Popular

altTitles.ja: わたモテ
私がモテないのはどう考えてもお前らが悪い!

altTitles.ko: 내가 인기 없는 건 아무리 생각해도 너희들 탓이야!

altTitles.th: สาวมืดมนอลวนหารัก

altTitles.es-la: No importa como lo vea, ¡Es culpa suya que yo no sea popular!

altTitles.ja-ro: Watashi ga Motenai no wa Dou Kangaetemo Omaera ga Warui!

description.en: Kuroki Tomoko is a super popular, high school girl, who has had 50 years of dating experience, and 100 boys… in the Otome game world. In the real world, she is a 15 year old loner, who has all of the qualities of a "mojo." However, when school isn't going as she expected, and she isn't as popular as she had thought she was, she takes a look at herself in the mirror for the first time in a few years, and has some shocking revelations…
description.pl: Główna bohaterka serii – Kuroki Tomoko – jest ultra-popularną uczennicą liceum, która umówiła się już z ponad setką chłopaków… W grach Otome. W realnym świecie jest socjopatką, która zupełnie nie radzi sobie z komunikacją z innymi ludźmi, a w szczególności z płcią przeciwną. Manga opowiada o jej kuriozalnych próbach (z reguły niezbyt udanych) usocjalnienia się i zmienienia się w osobę bardziej popularną.
description.es-la: Kuroki Tomoko, una chica que tiene "50 años de experiencia" en citas y que ha salido con más de un centenar de chicos… en juegos otome. En la vida real acaba de cumplir 15 años y va a dar comienzo su época en el instituto, está convencida de que con sus conocimientos será la más de popular. Una vez comienza el instituto, comienzan a pasar los días y se da cuenta de que no habla con nadie. ¿Cómo es posible? Un simple vistazo al espejo le hace darse cuenta de la realidad: no es precisamente una belleza y parece que hasta puede ser antipática. Poco a poco intentará cambiar para ser popular, pero claro, entre lo que le cuesta y lo que tiene una idea bastante distorsionada de la realidad, no será tan sencillo.

title.en: Sekai Saikyou no Majo, Hajimemashita ~Watashi Dake "Kouryaku Saito" o Miseru Sekai de Jiyuu ni Ikimasu~

altTitles.ja: 世界最強の魔女、始めました ～私だけ『攻略サイト』を見れる世界で自由に生きます～

altTitles.en: I Became the World's Strongest Witch: I Will Live Freely in a World Where Only I can Access the "Guide Site"
The World's Strongest Witch Has Begun - I Will Live Freely In A World Where Only I Can View The "Strategy Site" -

description.en:
An unknown skill turns into unlimited power with divine knowledge [Internet]!

"To manifest an SSS rank with the weakest skill is a disgrace!"

Rona is a girl who was expelled from her home due to her lack of money, food, and power. Lost and hopeless, she suddenly hears the words...

"Would you like some guidance?"

She discovers how to utilize her unique SSS rank skill: [Internet], which she alone possesses. The true nature of this skill is the ability to access this world's 'guide sites' - an extraordinary cheat skill! Endless production of valuable items! Acquiring ultra-rare equipment! Thanks to her skill, she can do as she pleases...!
description.ja:
「…攻略うぃき？」――最弱クラスのスキルを発現してしまい追放された少女・ローナ。しかしそのスキルの正体は、この世界の『攻略サイト』を見ることができるＳＳＳランクのチートスキル【インターネット】だった！

（１）冒険開始→（２）即・最強武器発見→（３）世界を混乱に陥れる最強少女に‥‥‥。ローナは言う。「私はただ、平和に自由に生きたいだけなのにいぃ‥‥‥！」

altTitles.ja: クールな同級生の◯◯年後...

altTitles.en: The Cool Classmate XX Years Later...

altTitles.ja: 約束のネバーランド

description.en:
At Grace Field House, life couldn't be better for the orphans! Though they have no parents, together with the other kids and a kind "Mama" who cares for them, they form one big, happy family. No child is ever overlooked, especially since they are all adopted by the age of 12. Their daily lives involve rigorous tests, but afterwards, they are allowed to play outside.   
  
There is only one rule they must obey: do not leave the orphanage. But one day, two top-scoring orphans, Emma and Norman, venture past the gate and unearth the horrifying reality behind their entire existence: they are all livestock, and their orphanage is a farm to cultivate food for a mysterious race of demons. With only a few months left to pull off an escape plan, the children must somehow change their predetermined fate.  

---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media as **The Promised Neverland** (2019)
description.fr:
Emma, Norman et Ray coulent des jours heureux à l’orphelinat Grace Field House. Entourés de leurs petits frères et sœurs, ils s’épanouissent sous l’attention pleine de tendresse de « Maman », qu'ils considèrent comme leur véritable mère. Mais tout bascule le soir où ils découvrent l’abominable réalité qui se cache derrière la façade de leur vie paisible ! Ils doivent s’échapper, c’est une question de vie ou de mort !

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Kazé / Crunchyroll**
description.pt:
Na “Casa de Grace Field” habitam 38 crianças órfãs.
Vivem felizes com a sua cuidadora, Isabella, a quem as crianças tratam como mãe. Mas certo dia, Emma e Norman descobrem que a Casa de Grace Field é afinal uma “quinta” cujo objetivo é criar alimento para monstros.
As remessas de crianças enviadas são escolhidas pela sua inteligência e desempenho em testes, que servem para tornar os seus cérebros… mais saborosos!
Não querendo perder mais nenhum membro da sua família, Norman e Emma começam a reunir informação vital para a sua sobrevivência e planeiam a sua fuga do orfanato.
description.ru:
Эмма и её друзья вели вполне счастливую сиротскую жизнь в приюте. Да, там жёсткие правила, но зато смотритель добрый. Вот только почему детям запрещено приближаться к воротам и забору?.. Иногда не известно, стоит ли узнавать правду, которая полностью переворачивает всю твою жизнь.  
  
- Won the 63rd Shogakukan Manga Awards in 2018 in the best shounen category.
  


---

**Links:]**   
- [Demizu's Twitter](https://twitter.com/DemizuPosuka)   
- [Anime Season 1 on ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=21552)  
- [Anime Season 2 on ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=23263)
description.pt-br: Emma, Norman e Ray são as crianças mais brilhantes do orfanato Grace Field House. E, sob os cuidados da mulher a que se referem como “mamãe”, todas as crianças tiveram uma vida confortável. Boa comida, roupas limpas e o ambiente perfeito para aprender - o que mais um órfão poderia querer? Um dia, porém, Emma e Norman descobrem a verdade sombria do mundo exterior que eles estão proibidos de ver.

altTitles.en: My Cat Is Waiting For Me!
My Kitten♂ Is Waiting, So I'm Going Home.

altTitles.ja: 子猫♂が待ってるので帰ります。

description.en:
Miyako is stressed out at work. Seeking solace, she tries to get a cat, but is unable to do so. She returns home dejected… only to find a child with cat ears and a hoodie lying on the floor…! When she rushes to take care of him, she finds out that he is a very beautiful boy!

The cute and dangerous life together of a beautiful boy and an office worker begins!

altTitles.ja: にゃことはかせ

altTitles.pt-br: A Empre-Gata Nyako e a Professora

description.en: Twitter short series by @SORAji34
description.ru: Короткие истории из жизни профессора и её горничной — Няко.
description.pt-br: Uma Série Curta do Twitter feita pelo @SORAji34

altTitles.ja: ぎゅぎゅっと高橋

description.en:
Videogames x Showa Culture x Glamour! A voluptuous and fascinating book for those that enjoy the Showa Era and playing video games! A large collection of stories, published in Harta by Benitsubaki's author, Takahashi Hirona, all in one volume!

Two glamorous folk tales, including "Glamorous-suteyama", a glamorous rearrangement of the Ubasuteyama legend!
When a witch fostering a planet sprays it with some water, torrential rains begin to pour from above in "My first planet"
"Shiramari" is a super idol whose singing voice makes people so happy they could die!
And of course, the series of 16 shorts "It's okay to play games", the antithesis of being given a cold look while you're playing video games!

Full of bright, fantastical ideas, all these gems from Harta's new wave, Takahashi Hirona, in a single volume!
